title: Rajputana Grandeur: Diamond and Emerald Statement Haaram
materials: High-Quality Baguette and Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (VS Clarity
Zambian origin). Features Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: A breathtaking haaram showcasing a modern take on traditional design. The central floral motif is intricately crafted with pave-set diamonds, surrounding a vibrant oval-cut emerald. Baguette diamonds are meticulously set in linear patterns along the necklace, creating a striking geometric contrast. Delicate gold bead accents add a touch of traditional charm. The pendant features a spherical diamond-encrusted element, adding dimension and movement.
colors: accented by the rich green of the emeralds. The combination creates a regal and luxurious appearance
reminiscent of South Indian bridal jewelry.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)

and high-profile parties. Also suitable for Seemantham (baby shower) or a special anniversary gift. Its modern design allows it to be worn at contemporary events where a touch of elegance and tradition is desired.
description: This Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design principles with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds ensures enduring brilliance. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a long-lasting shine. It's a statement piece that embodies both cultural significance and contemporary style, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. The intricate detailing and exceptional craftsmanship make this a truly unique and desirable piece.
